app_description: 99 character recognition rate translation dictionary pronunciation application. It takes time to draw a dictionary and it is hard to read a foreign language ... With this application you only need to tap a word for a dictionary. In addition this will also translate so it s best for improving your language skills! This is the most innovative Photo translator. There is also a Lite free version so please try first. Best for study english !! Major features Supported languages are 53 languages! French German Italian Chinese Korean etc ... Dictionary pronunciation function Recommended environment IOS 14.0 or later iPhone 6 or later iPadAir or later
